original:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]威力を最大10まで吸収し、体力最大値の(吸収した[Laceration]威力 × 2)%だけ体力を回復([Laceration]威力は1未満に下がらない)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]威力を最大10まで吸収し、体力最大値の(吸収した[Laceration]威力 × 2)%だけ体力を回復([Laceration]威力は1未満に下がらない)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 대상의 [Laceration] 위력을 최대 10까지 흡수하여 최대 체력의 (흡수한 [Laceration] 위력 x 2)%만큼 체력 회복 ([Laceration] 위력은 1 미만으로 감소하지 않음)
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Absorb up to 10 [Laceration] Potency from the target and heal ([Laceration] Potency absorbed x 2)% HP (this effect does not lower the target's [Laceration] Potency under 1)

original:

original:
[WhenUse] 保有した[Charge]回数を全て消耗し、体力最大値の2 × (15 - 消耗した[Charge]回数)%だけ体力を消費してコイン威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 保有した[Charge]回数を全て消耗し、体力最大値の2 × (15 - 消耗した[Charge]回数)%だけ体力を消費してコイン威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 보유한 [Charge] 횟수를 전부 소모하고, 최대 체력의 2 x (15 - 소모한 [Charge] 횟수)% 만큼 체력을 소모하여 코인 위력 +2
EN:
[WhenUse] Consume all [Charge] Count on self and consume 2(15 - [Charge] Count consumed)% HP to gain Coin Power +2

[WhenUse] 保有した[Charge]回数を全て消耗し、体力最大値の2 × (15 - 消耗した[Charge]回数)%だけ体力を消費してコイン威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 保有した[Charge]回数を全て消耗し、体力最大値の2 × (15 - 消耗した[Charge]回数)%だけ体力を消費してコイン威力 +2
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 보유한 [Charge] 횟수를 전부 소모하고, 최대 체력의 2 x (15 - 소모한 [Charge] 횟수)% 만큼 체력을 소모하여 코인 위력 +2
EN:
[WhenUse] Consume all [Charge] Count on self and consume 2(15 - [Charge] Count consumed)% HP to gain Coin Power +2

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 6 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 6 [Laceration]

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 횟수 1 증가
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Laceration] Count

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [AttackDown] 3 부여.
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [AttackDown]

original:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]威力を最大10まで吸収し、体力最大値の(吸収した[Laceration]威力 × 2)%だけ体力を回復([Laceration]威力は1未満に下がらない)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]威力を最大10まで吸収し、体力最大値の(吸収した[Laceration]威力 × 2)%だけ体力を回復([Laceration]威力は1未満に下がらない)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 대상의 [Laceration] 위력을 최대 10까지 흡수하여 최대 체력의 (흡수한 [Laceration] 위력 x 2)%만큼 체력 회복 ([Laceration] 위력은 1 미만으로 감소하지 않음)
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Absorb up to 10 [Laceration] Potency from the target and heal ([Laceration] Potency absorbed x 2)% HP (this effect does not lower the target's [Laceration] Potency under 1)

original:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]を吸収して体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[OnSucceedAttack] 対象の[Laceration]を吸収して体力を回復
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 대상의 [Laceration]을 흡수하여 체력 회복
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Absorb [Laceration] on target to heal

KR:
가드
EN:
Guard

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:

EN:
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] Count on self (max 2)

의체 가동

EN:

작살 표식

original:
[StartBattle] 自分の[Charge]回数が5未満なら、自分の[Charge]回数を5, [Laceration]回数を3増加させて[Vulnerable]1を得る
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が10以上なら、[Charge]回数を5消耗して[AttackUp]3を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[StartBattle] 自分の[Charge]回数が5未満なら、自分の[Charge]回数を5, [Laceration]回数を3増加させて[Vulnerable]1を得る
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が10以上なら、[Charge]回数を5消耗して[AttackUp]3を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[StartBattle] 자신의 [Charge] 횟수가 5 미만이면, 자신의 [Charge] 횟수 5, [Laceration] 횟수 3 증가하고, [Vulnerable] 1을 얻음
[WhenUse] [Charge] 횟수가 10 이상이면, [Charge] 횟수를 5 소모하여 [AttackUp] 3을 얻음
EN:
[StartBattle] At 5- [Charge] Count, gain 5 [Charge] Count, 3 [Laceration] Count, and 1 [Vulnerable]
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Charge] Count, consume 5 [Charge] Count to gain 3 [AttackUp]

original:
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が10以上なら、[Charge]回数を3消耗してコイン威力 +1
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が15以上なら、[Charge]回数を3を追加で消耗してダメージ量 + 20%
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が5未満なら、体力が最大値の10%分減少して[Charge]回数が5増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が10以上なら、[Charge]回数を3消耗してコイン威力 +1
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が15以上なら、[Charge]回数を3を追加で消耗してダメージ量 + 20%
[WhenUse] [Charge]回数が5未満なら、体力が最大値の10%分減少して[Charge]回数が5増加
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] [Charge] 횟수가 10 이상이면, [Charge] 횟수 3을 소모하여 코인 위력 +1
[WhenUse] [Charge] 횟수가 15 이상이면, [Charge] 횟수 3을 추가로 소모하여 피해량 + 20%
[WhenUse] [Charge] 횟수가 5 미만이면, 최대 체력의 10%만큼 체력이 감소하고 [Charge] 횟수 5 증가
EN:
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Charge] Count, consume 3 [Charge] Count to gain Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At 15+ [Charge] Count, consume 3 additional [Charge] Count to deal +20% damage
[WhenUse] At 5- [Charge] Count, lose 10% HP and gain +5 [Charge] Count

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Laceration] 3 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Laceration]

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] 다음 턴에 [Binding] 1 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Binding] next turn

KR:

EN:
Hardblood Reflux
